name: All Men Are Equal
description:
This is a two player pc puzzle game The objective is to solve the puzzles until you can get off the ship!

Player 1 controls the big guy. His controls are:

W - Jump, A - Left, D - Right, S - Action, Left Shift - throw player 2

Player 2 controls the small guy. His controls are:

Arrow Up - Jump, Arrow Left - Left, Arrow Right - Right, Arrow Down - Action, Mouse (Aim), Mouse button 1 - throw banana to hit switches

Hit Escape or P in game to pause
